name: BerlinBeers
0:
”Alexa, ask Berlin Beers to suggest a beer.”
”Alexa, tell Berlin Beers to hit me with a beer.”
”Alexa, open Berlin Beers.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: berlin beers
des: Simply ask the Berlin Beers to suggest a beer and it will suggest you a beer made in Berlin. It will also send you a card with image, types of beer, and ABV level to your mobile device. When you open the Berlin Beer skill it will also ask for beer type to choose from.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
